mapper.select: SELECT * FROM order WHERE 1=1 order by sort
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO order( value, label, type, description, sort, create_date, update_date, remarks, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{value}, #{label}, #{type}, #{description}, #{sort}, #{createDate}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE order SET value = #{value}, label = #{label}, type = #{type}, description = #{description}, sort = #{sort}, update_date = #{updateDate} WHERE id = #{id}
